page.title: 11LOCAL ACTIVITIES RAVENGLASS
page.content: In the village there is a village hall where dances,whist drives,etc are held. There is also a branch of the Womens Instute,and the Mothers Union.There is an annual Whitsuntide fair with craft stalls,steam engines,raft races etc.In the autumn there is the annual Black Combe Beagles puppy show and sheepdog trials.This is becoming more like a gamefair every year and is very popular.The is also an annual flower show and a few evening classes are run in the village hall. The Ravenglass Boating Association and the Ravenglass and Eskdale Railway Preservation Society both meet regularly in the village.
